website_summaries.verdict: A stylish button-down tunic from a beloved company. Choose from several colors and patterns.
pros: Many owners say the tunic is flattering and true to size
cons: This tunic hails from a reputable maker and is therefore pricey

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE SHIRT
customer_reviews.text: I own this top in 3 colors. I am thin....I bought a medium. I have 36DDD bust. It fits me better than any other shirt I've ever owned. Even though I'm big busted with a small waist....it's very tailered and fits me perfectly as if it was custom tailered. It's tunic length which I love. Own black, white and the black and white flower pattern. The shirt looks better than the photo and the pocket has gold CK initials. Also, the best thing about this top is it doesn't wrinkle even in extreme warm weather. Love, love, love this shirt its worth every penny of the hefty price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great style and fabric
customer_reviews.text: I buy every one of these Calvin Klein collared, roll tab polyester shirts I can find about 30-31 inches long and relaxed fit. I have 20 of the mandarin collar style with same fabric but need many more with the collar. I would buy every solid solid color if made and florals also if made with collars as it gives me diversity in style to my apparel. I also wish Calvin Klein would make this collared version in a thicker type of 100% polyester fabric for cooler weather. There is a real shortage of those and I am having great difficulty finding 31 inch long polyester shirts with relaxed fit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel, doesn't wrinkle, dries quickly. Long shirt tails look good over tight jeans or tights. I wish the buttons were not gold with a CK logo on the pocket; I don't like to be a walking ad for the designer.
customer_reviews.author: D. McGrew

customer_reviews.title: nice fitting tunic
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice fitting tunic. Be aware of CK logo button - its not too ostentatious, but I wish manufacturers would refrain from putting such symbols on products.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to cover with confidence
customer_reviews.text: I like everything Except the fabric weight could have been a little heavier. It seems too sheer when fabric comes in contact with skin. It would give the collar a crisper shape. A bit pricey but that’s a given with the brand. With that said, I’m happy with the purchase, glad I got it and would recommend it to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them both
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these shirts, in Blush and Grey. Love them both. You can wear them casually or dress up with right accessories. I had no problems with the synthetic fabric they are made of, it's pretty soft and breathable to my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mareika

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is roomy, comfortable, but still looks semi-dressy. It washes well and holds up well, with minimal care. I steamed it the frist time but then did not have to after that. I just hang it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Plano Gal

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Decent fabric. But kinda sheer and just frumpy and shapeless. Better for apple shapes or short women who can wear it as a mini dress
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love this blouse!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore this tunic blouse was on a trip and it had been in a suitcase. No wrinkles! It is a beautiful fit (I’m 5’5, 130# and ordered size medium) and good quality fabric. Very pleased with this purchase. Only negative is the “CK” logo on pocket but all Calvin Klein clothing has a logo somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mandarin Empress

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHIRT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt in 2 colors. It is one of my favorites. It works with jeans as well as dressier slacks. Comfortable and covers the posterior.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of roll up sleeves that aren't stitched in place.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was nice & felt comfortable, but I really am not a fan of roll tab sleeves unless they are stitched in place. . I returned them. If they were made with short sleeves I would have loved it & ordered more colors.
customer_reviews.author: pepper54

customer_reviews.title: Yey for CK
customer_reviews.text: I love these Calvin Klein shirts. I work in a business casual environment, and they work perfectly with leggings and boots, dress pants and pumps, or even with jeans. I do go up a size, only because I like them loose and flowy. The price is great compared to brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Kmitch

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color but did not like the fit or the material. I used Amazon's Prime Wardrobe for this and two other shirts. Trying it on in the privacy of my home was great and the return was easy. I will try Prime Wardrobe again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shirt and low maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shirt that comes out of the laundry ready to wear. Nice with leggings, jeans or dress pants. I’ll be buying more similar Calvin Klein shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Martha B.

customer_reviews.title: Best shirt I've bought in years
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and so beautiful. I bought another one I loved it so much. Great for larger size women who are also short.
customer_reviews.author: EverApril

customer_reviews.title: Good looking top; size down
customer_reviews.text: Really versatile blouse. Easy wear, doesn't wrinkle, packs light for travel. I had to return for a small size from 1X to OX. Happy with the fit of the OX.
customer_reviews.author: M.V. Young

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Deep beautiful plum color that is perfect for fall.True to size fit and easy care .Machine wash cold and hang dry with a cool iron touch up.Love the brand and the shirt. Looks great with leggings!
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute tunic. It's fitted enough that you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute tunic. It's fitted enough that you don't see any lumps or bumps. The purple/eggplant is an elegant color
customer_reviews.author: smofarrell

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and style. Even slimming I’d say. I’m 5’7’’ and it hits just below my butt. I bought two colors and wish they made this shirt in more dark colors.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Would look great on a taller person
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality shirt and I do use it when I want to dress up a little. It is somewhat large on me. I ordered the 1x. I am 5'3" and it is almost too long to be flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Janet F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt, material a bit thin. As others have mentioned, I too wish the logo wasn't so prominent.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: This fits very well: just fingertip length, nice drape, not baggy. Washs beautifully, looks great right out of the dryer. It's a great basic
customer_reviews.author: M. Stott

customer_reviews.title: Little or no ironing!
customer_reviews.text: Top to wear with jeans or slacks to dress up a bit. Comfortable and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another winning shirt from Calvin Klein.....
customer_reviews.text: quick ship, shirt as described, very satisfied with purchase, will purchase more in different colors. A+
customer_reviews.author: Claymaker

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage of rear and front
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to wear with leggings or slim pants for a more professional look
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly feminine
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved CK and this is up to his usual standards..
customer_reviews.author: Military love

customer_reviews.title: I love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for the perfect casual button down this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but had to return it item was runs big,
customer_reviews.author: Suzann

customer_reviews.title: I love this blouses for work they do fit a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this blouses for work they do fit a little big but it's fine I usually wear a cardigan so it doesn't look that big but could wear it without a cardigan
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: Used not new shirt
customer_reviews.text: Shirt arrived stained, wrinkled and with a Macy’s return sticker on the tag.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this blouse, it's confortable, it's elegant and feels amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: maria mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Wish the back hem was not longer than the front. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: redhat

customer_reviews.title: Stained , overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: There were foundation stains on the sleeves and the front buttons area of the blouse. Over-priced for the quality of blouse sold. Product description by seller BobbiBricka should mention these defects before selling.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A perfect tunic
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous, functional tunic. The print is beautiful, and it is virtually wrinkle free. Travels very well. Love it and bought three other colors. This print is exceptional and wish they had more of the creative fabrics. I am an XL and have a difficult time finding tops that look tailored, crisp and are comfortable as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully constructed blouse.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is lightweight and stays wrinkle-free. The sleeves, when rolled up, still cover the elbow. Two patch pockets on the chest--so rare on women's blouses, and so welcome! The black-and-white print goes nicely with black bottoms, of which I have many. It's long enough that someone so disposed could wear leggings or tights rather than pants or a skirt. The label says "Made in Indonesia" There is a "CK" on the chest and gold buttons, flash which I could have done without. I'm considering replacing the buttons with black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Just ask me!

customer_reviews.title: Not my style
customer_reviews.text: Im just really not a fan of this. The polyester is just sooo polyester looking (with the right finish polyester can look good ,but this fabric just doesn't do that). The gold tone CK emblem looks cheap to me, as do the tiny gold tone buttons. I'm sure that for some women this shirt is a winner, it just is not my style. Also, as this is a tunic I would like to see this a tad longer. Average to shorter women will probably like this better than taller women.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: Sheer and impressed with fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sheer tunic. It does need a shirt underneath. The print and detailing are nice but I find I get to hot with multiple layers so the sheet factor was a no for me. I wasn't impressed with the fabric feel either. It was stiff and starchy. I haven't washed it yet but it didn't make me "ooo" after touching. The fit was good and even a little over sized on me (I'm a small).
customer_reviews.author: Sassbot

customer_reviews.title: Polyester Tunic
customer_reviews.text: This fits loosely, as you'd expect a tunic to fit, you could even wear it over a tank or tee. It's a thin material but not see-through. Frankly, I don't like the feel of the fabric and I don't expect to wear this very often. It's a kind of rough synthetic feel rather than silky smooth or cottony soft. Although it would probably be very cool on a hot day and still provide sun coverage.
customer_reviews.author: takingadayoff

customer_reviews.title: great tunic
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the flora design on this blouse/tunic. It is very loose, but not so loose as to be baggy. She says it's quite comfortable and the material is soft against her skin. Needless to say, this is a quality piece of clothing and very fashionable. I give it five stars based on my wife's approval!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Attractive faintly Hawaiian tunic
customer_reviews.text: I love Calvin Klein clothes. This is an attractive shirt that pairs with black jeans, black leggings, a suit jacket, black slacks, white jeans/pants, you name it. Versatile and faintly Hawaiian in design, it's a beautiful addition to my wardrobe. The material is comfortable, the sleeves the right length.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it - very easy care
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt - it fits perfectly and is just the right length to wear with skinny pants. I am 5 6 around 140 and the medium was a perfect fit. The material is soft and it washes like a dream. I usually hang my clothes to dry to keep them in good shape but my husband threw this in the dryer by accident and it came out perfectly. The floral pattern is very attractive and can't be easily dressed up with the right jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt! I've worn and washed it several times. It washes beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Roll Sleeve Tunic Blouse (Regular and Plus Sizes)
product_meta.description: Solid button front roll sleeve tunic blouse with pocket
